sentences: Ma arvan, et sa oleksid võinud paremini käituda.
Kui ma oleksin rikkam, siis ma oleksid reisinud rohkem.
context: The word 'oleksid' is a conditional form of the verb 'olema' (to be) in Estonian. It expresses what would have been or should have been, often used to indicate regret, possibility, or hypothetical situations.
